title: Helmsman Schema Enhancement Strategy
details:
Database migration strategy for Helmsman implementation:

PHASED APPROACH:
1. Add nullable columns first (safe, non-breaking)
2. Backfill existing data with sensible defaults (MEDIUM energy, ADMINISTRATIVE focus, priority 3)
3. Add NOT NULL constraints after backfill (potentially breaking)

KEY DECISIONS:
- EnergyLevel enum: LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH (maps to user energy patterns)
- FocusType enum: CREATIVE/TECHNICAL/ADMINISTRATIVE/SOCIAL (aligns with work types)
- Priority scale: 1-5 (1=lowest, 5=highest priority)
- Both soft and hard deadlines supported
- TaskSource tracking: SELF/BOSS/COLLEAGUE/SYSTEM/AI

ROLLBACK PLAN:
- Each migration phase can be rolled back independently
- Column drops are safe if no dependencies exist
- Staging environment validation required before production
